0: A RESOLUTION COMMENDING THE IGLESIA NI CRISTO FOR CONDUCTING "MY COUNTRYMEN, MY BRETHREN" OUTREACH-EVANGELICAL PROGRAM AND AID FOR HUMANITY (LINGAP SA MAMAMAYAN) IN KING WILLIAMS' TOWN IN SOUTH AFRICA RESULTING IN THE DOWNPOUR OF THE EXPRESSION OF GRATITUDE AND GOOD WILL AMONG SOUTH AFRICAN NATIVES AND THE EXPRESSION OF THEIR DESIRE TO JOIN THE IGLESIA NI CRISTO

FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION COMMENDING THE IGLESIA NI CRISTO FOR CONDUCTING "MY COUNTRYMEN, MY BRETHREN" OUTREACH-EVANGELICAL PROGRAM AND AID FOR HUMANITY (LINGAP SA MAMAMAYAN) IN KING WILLIAMS' TOWN IN SOUTH AFRICA RESULTING IN THE DOWNPOUR OF THE EXPRESSION OF GRATITUDE AND GOOD WILL AMONG SOUTH AFRICAN NATIVES AND THE EXPRESSION OF THEIR DESIRE TO JOIN THE IGLESIA NI CRISTO
